item.title: mikelee.co: Powered by RMarkdown, knitr, and Jekyll
item.author: mdlee12@gmail.com (Michael Lee)
item.description: This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. Spend a few months documenting code scripts in RStudio and you'll have surely seen those introductory lines numerous times. This is also a R code script. And a markdown document. And an HTML page. All of which are generated within one .
